summary: When a cunning, unscrupulous mobster is sentenced to a Florida prison farm, he launches a deadly escape plan.
cast: Richard Conte|Audrey Totter|John McIntire|Sam Jaffe|Shepperd Strudwick|Gregg Martell|Phillip Pine|Donald Randolph|Royal Dano|Richard Taber|Dabbs Greer
keywords: new york city|spousal abuse|brutality|cold blooded murder|new york racketeer
title: Under the Gun
